name: Washington University in St. Louis |imag
athletics: NCAA Division III UAA, 19 varsity teams as of Fall 2008
publictransit: Skinker (Metrolink), U-City-Big Bend (Metrolink)  '''Washington University in St. Louis''' is a nonsectarian, private research university located in suburban St. Louis, Missouri. Founded in 1853 and named for George Washington, the university has students and faculty from all fifty U.S. states and more than one hundred and twenty five nations.<ref name
